graphql.query:
mutation createAlbum ($name: String!, $released: Int, $artistsIds: [ID], $bandsIds: [ID]!, $trackIds: [ID]!, $genresIds: [ID]!, $image: String) {
    createAlbum (name: $name, released: $released, artistsIds: $artistsIds, bandsIds: $bandsIds, trackIds: $trackIds, genresIds: $genresIds, image: $image) {
        id
        name
        released
        artists {
            id
            firstName
            secondName
            middleName
            birthDate
            birthPlace
            country
            bands {
                id
                name
                origin
                members {
                    id
                    firstName
                    secondName
                    middleName
                    instrument
                    years
                }
                website
                genres {
                    id
                    name
                    description
                    country
                    year
                }
            }
            instruments
        }
        bands {
            id
            name
            origin
            members {
                id
                firstName
                secondName
                middleName
                instrument
                years
            }
            website
            genres {
                id
                name
                description
                country
                year
            }
        }
        tracks {
            id
            title
            albums {
                id
                name
                released
                artists {
                    id
                    firstName
                    secondName
                    middleName
                    birthDate
                    birthPlace
                    country
                    bands {
                        id
                        name
                        origin
                        website
                    }
                    instruments
                }
                bands {
                    id
                    name
                    origin
                    members {
                        id
                        firstName
                        secondName
                        middleName
                        instrument
                        years
                    }
                    website
                    genres {
                        id
                        name
                        description
                        country
                        year
                    }
                }
                tracks {
                    id
                    title
                    bands {
                        id
                        name
                        origin
                        website
                    }
                    artists {
                        id
                        firstName
                        secondName
                        middleName
                        birthDate
                        birthPlace
                        country
                        instruments
                    }
                    duration
                    released
                    genres {
                        id
                        name
                        description
                        country
                        year
                    }
                }
                genres {
                    id
                    name
                    description
                    country
                    year
                }
                image
            }
            bands {
                id
                name
                origin
                members {
                    id
                    firstName
                    secondName
                    middleName
                    instrument
                    years
                }
                website
                genres {
                    id
                    name
                    description
                    country
                    year
                }
            }
            artists {
                id
                firstName
                secondName
                middleName
                birthDate
                birthPlace
                country
                bands {
                    id
                    name
                    origin
                    members {
                        id
                        firstName
                        secondName
                        middleName
                        instrument
                        years
                    }
                    website
                    genres {
                        id
                        name
                        description
                        country
                        year
                    }
                }
                instruments
            }
            duration
            released
            genres {
                id
                name
                description
                country
                year
            }
        }
        genres {
            id
            name
            description
            country
            year
        }
        image
    }
}
